text:
SSB Dog Dinny adjudged BEST DOG of 61st All India Police Duty Meet of all the State Police & CAPFs. 
387/400 - highest marks ever
She also won the GoldMedal in Narcotic detection.
Chief Guest, CM Tamilnadu did the honours.
Kudos to Dog Handler Ct Anil Kumar 50 Bn
#SSBRockspic.twitter.com/CTpKbcpsoV
